paper_abstract: We introduce new estimates and tests of independence in copula models with unknown margins using phi-divergences and the duality technique. The asymptotic laws of the estimates and the test statistics are established both when the parameter is an interior or a boundary value of the parameter space. Simulation results show that the choice of chi(2)-divergence has good properties in terms of efficiency-robustness.
paper_title: NEW ESTIMATES AND TESTS OF INDEPENDENCE IN SEMIPARAMETRIC COPULA MODELS
